channel.title: Sentence Maker
channel.description:
Another one of my mini-scripts that i've made when i was bored, if ou wanna add more words or change words go right ahead, i just put in some sample ones you can use, its not exactly fully finished, i could add some more sentence forms but i got tired of it so here it is, just copy, paste, and press play: [code] Program SentenceMaker;
Const NP = 4; //Number of "Pre-Adjectives" NAJ = 11; //Number of Adjectives NN = 6; //Number of Nouns NV = 6; //Number of Verbs NPR = 4; //Number of "Pre-Verbs" NPV = 2; //Number of "Post-Verbs"
Var PreAdj: Array [0..NP] of String; Adj: Array [0..NAJ] of String; Noun: Array [0..NN] of String; Verb: Array [0..NV] of String; PreVerb: Array [0..NPR] of String; PostVerb: Array [0..NPV] of String;
Begin PreAdj[0]:='very ' PreAdj[1]:='really ' PreAdj[2]:='increadibly ' PreAdj[3]:='not-so-'
Adj[0]:='fat' Adj[1]:='small' Adj[2]:='gay' Adj[3]:='odd' Adj[4]:='cold' Adj[5]:='stupid' Adj[6]:='ugly' Adj[7]:='deadly' Adj[8]:='speedy' Adj[9]:='hilarious' Adj[10]:='old'
Noun[0]:='lake' Noun[1]:='dog' Noun[2]:='tree' Noun[3]:='man' Noun[4]:='hill' Noun[5]:='beast'
Verb[0]:='running' Verb[1]:='pooping' Verb[2]:='skipping' Verb[3]:='killing people' Verb[4]:='farting' Verb[5]:='eating'
PreVerb[0]:='loudly' PreVerb[1]:='dangerously' PreVerb[2]:='slowly' PreVerb[3]:='poorly'
PostVerb[0]:='fast' PostVerb[1]:='funny' Repeat ClearDebug; Case Random(8) of 0: Begin writeln('The '+Noun[0+random(NN)]+' is '+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]) wait(2000); End; 1: Begin writeln('The '+Noun[0+random(NN)]+' is '+Verb[0+random(NV)]) wait(2000); End; 2: Begin writeln('The '+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+' '+Noun[0+random(NN)]+' is '+Verb[0+random(NV)]+' '+PostVerb[0+random(NPV)]) wait(2500) End; 3: Begin writeln('The '+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+' '+Noun[0+random(NN)]+' is '+Verb[0+random(NV)]+' '+PreVerb[0+random(NPR)]) wait(2500) End; 4: Begin writeln('The '+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+' '+Noun[0+random(NN)]+' is '+PreVerb[0+random(NPR)]+' '+Verb[0+random(NV)]) wait(2500) End; 5: Begin writeln('The '+PreAdj[0+random(NP)]+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+' '+Noun[0+random(NN)]+' is '+Verb[0+random(NV)]+' '+PostVerb[0+random(NPV)]) wait(3000) End; 6: Begin writeln('The '+PreAdj[0+random(NP)]+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+' '+Noun[0+random(NN)]+' is '+Verb[0+random(NV)]+' '+PreVerb[0+random(NPR)]) wait(3000) End; 7: Begin writeln('The '+PreAdj[0+random(NP)]+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+' '+Noun[0+random(NN)]+' is '+PreVerb[0+random(NPR)]+' '+Verb[0+random(NV)]) wait(3000) End; End; Until(False) End. [\code][/code]

You can make it random too.

Just use:

MyArray[Random(GetArrayLength(MyArray))]

item.title: Sentence Maker
item.dc:creator: @deathbyvirus deathbyvirus
item.description:
@deathbyvirus wrote:

I know what you mean by the Is and was it does get way to repeatative. Oohh haha I was a little blunt for like 5 minutes while i tried to figure out what your first function was that you made was for, then it clicked lol. The way that you show arrays there though is that the string isn’t random, it runs through them all in order, but i do see what you mean and it would save a lot of space.

Read full topic

item.title: Sentence Maker
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Nice script death.

Hey, to make your script a little better, try switching the words ‘is’ and ‘was’.

Here is program I made with a function called RandSwitch();

program New;

function RandSwitch(Text,Text2 : string) : string;
begin
  if(Random(2) = 0)then
    Result := Text
  else
    Result := Text2;
end;

begin
  ClearDebug;
  WriteLn(RandSwitch('is','was'));
end.

Also, you can make your arrays like this instead and you don’t have to set a value like 0…45 or something.

program New;

var
  i : integer;
  MyArray : array of string;

begin
  ClearDebug;
  MyArray := ['lol','rofl','haha','jaja','lmao'];
  for i := 0 to GetArrayLength(MyArray)-1 do
    WriteLn('I told him my dog died and he had the odacity to say, "'+MyArray[i]+'"!');
end.

Hope that helps. Great program man!

Read full topic

item.title: Sentence Maker
item.dc:creator: @deathbyvirus deathbyvirus
item.description:
@deathbyvirus wrote:

Another one of my mini-scripts that i’ve made when i was bored, if ou wanna add more words or change words go right ahead, i just put in some sample ones you can use, its not exactly fully finished, i could add some more sentence forms but i got tired of it so here it is, just copy, paste, and press play:

[code]
Program SentenceMaker;

Const
NP = 4; //Number of “Pre-Adjectives”
NAJ = 11; //Number of Adjectives
NN = 6; //Number of Nouns
NV = 6; //Number of Verbs
NPR = 4; //Number of “Pre-Verbs”
NPV = 2; //Number of “Post-Verbs”

Var
PreAdj: Array [0…NP] of String;
Adj: Array [0…NAJ] of String;
Noun: Array [0…NN] of String;
Verb: Array [0…NV] of String;
PreVerb: Array [0…NPR] of String;
PostVerb: Array [0…NPV] of String;

Begin
PreAdj[0]:='very ’
PreAdj[1]:='really ’
PreAdj[2]:='increadibly ’
PreAdj[3]:=‘not-so-’

Adj[0]:=‘fat’
Adj[1]:=‘small’
Adj[2]:=‘gay’
Adj[3]:=‘odd’
Adj[4]:=‘cold’
Adj[5]:=‘stupid’
Adj[6]:=‘ugly’
Adj[7]:=‘deadly’
Adj[8]:=‘speedy’
Adj[9]:=‘hilarious’
Adj[10]:=‘old’

Noun[0]:=‘lake’
Noun[1]:=‘dog’
Noun[2]:=‘tree’
Noun[3]:=‘man’
Noun[4]:=‘hill’
Noun[5]:=‘beast’

Verb[0]:=‘running’
Verb[1]:=‘pooping’
Verb[2]:=‘skipping’
Verb[3]:=‘killing people’
Verb[4]:=‘farting’
Verb[5]:=‘eating’

PreVerb[0]:=‘loudly’
PreVerb[1]:=‘dangerously’
PreVerb[2]:=‘slowly’
PreVerb[3]:=‘poorly’

PostVerb[0]:=‘fast’
PostVerb[1]:=‘funny’
Repeat
ClearDebug;
Case Random(8) of
0: Begin
writeln('The ‘+Noun[0+random(NN)]+’ is '+Adj[0+random(NAJ)])
wait(2000);
End;
1: Begin
writeln('The ‘+Noun[0+random(NN)]+’ is '+Verb[0+random(NV)])
wait(2000);
End;
2: Begin
writeln('The ‘+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+’ ‘+Noun[0+random(NN)]+’ is ‘+Verb[0+random(NV)]+’ '+PostVerb[0+random(NPV)])
wait(2500)
End;
3: Begin
writeln('The ‘+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+’ ‘+Noun[0+random(NN)]+’ is ‘+Verb[0+random(NV)]+’ '+PreVerb[0+random(NPR)])
wait(2500)
End;
4: Begin
writeln('The ‘+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+’ ‘+Noun[0+random(NN)]+’ is ‘+PreVerb[0+random(NPR)]+’ '+Verb[0+random(NV)])
wait(2500)
End;
5: Begin
writeln('The ‘+PreAdj[0+random(NP)]+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+’ ‘+Noun[0+random(NN)]+’ is ‘+Verb[0+random(NV)]+’ '+PostVerb[0+random(NPV)])
wait(3000)
End;
6: Begin
writeln('The ‘+PreAdj[0+random(NP)]+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+’ ‘+Noun[0+random(NN)]+’ is ‘+Verb[0+random(NV)]+’ '+PreVerb[0+random(NPR)])
wait(3000)
End;
7: Begin
writeln('The ‘+PreAdj[0+random(NP)]+Adj[0+random(NAJ)]+’ ‘+Noun[0+random(NN)]+’ is ‘+PreVerb[0+random(NPR)]+’ '+Verb[0+random(NV)])
wait(3000)
End;
End;
Until(False)
End.
[\code][/code]

Read full topic
